name: Plugin
description: The Plugin interface provides information about a browser plugin.

members.name: Plugin.description
members.description: A human readable description of the plugin.

members.name: Plugin.filename
members.description: The filename of the plugin file.

members.name: Plugin.item
members.description: Returns the MIME type of a supported content type, given the index number into a list of supported types.

members.name: Plugin.namedItem
members.description: Returns the MIME type of a supported item.
